00011 // homogeneous.cpp*
00012 #include "volume.h"
00013 // HomogeneousVolume Declarations
00014 class HomogeneousVolume : public VolumeRegion {
00015 public:
00016         // HomogeneousVolume Public Methods
00017         HomogeneousVolume(const Spectrum &sa, const Spectrum &ss, float gg,
00018                         const Spectrum &emit, const BBox &e,
00019                         const Transform &v2w) {
00020                 WorldToVolume = v2w.GetInverse();
00021                 sig_a = sa;
00022                 sig_s = ss;
00023                 g = gg;
00024                 le = emit;
00025                 extent = e;
00026         }
00027         BBox WorldBound() const {
00028                 return WorldToVolume.GetInverse()(extent);
00029         }
00030         bool IntersectP(const Ray &r, float *t0, float *t1) const {
00031                 Ray ray = WorldToVolume(r);
00032                 return extent.IntersectP(ray, t0, t1);
00033         }
00034         Spectrum sigma_a(const Point &p, const Vector &) const {
00035                 return extent.Inside(WorldToVolume(p)) ? sig_a : 0.;
00036         }
00037         Spectrum sigma_s(const Point &p, const Vector &) const {
00038                 return extent.Inside(WorldToVolume(p)) ? sig_s : 0.;
00039         }
00040         Spectrum sigma_t(const Point &p, const Vector &) const {
00041                 return extent.Inside(WorldToVolume(p)) ? (sig_a + sig_s) : 0.;
00042         }
00043         Spectrum Lve(const Point &p, const Vector &) const {
00044                 return extent.Inside(WorldToVolume(p)) ? le : 0.;
00045         }
00046         float p(const Point &p, const Vector &wi, const Vector &wo) const {
00047                 if (!extent.Inside(WorldToVolume(p))) return 0.;
00048                 return PhaseHG(wi, wo, g);
00049         }
00050         Spectrum Tau(const Ray &ray, float, float) const {
00051                 float t0, t1;
00052                 if (!IntersectP(ray, &t0, &t1)) return 0.;
00053                 return Distance(ray(t0), ray(t1)) * (sig_a + sig_s);
00054         }
00055 private:
00056         // HomogeneousVolume Private Data
00057         Spectrum sig_a, sig_s, le;
00058         float g;
00059         BBox extent;
00060         Transform WorldToVolume;
00061 };
00062 // HomogeneousVolume Method Definitions
00063 extern "C" DLLEXPORT VolumeRegion *CreateVolumeRegion(const Transform &volume2world,
00064                 const ParamSet &params) {
00065         // Initialize common volume region parameters
00066         Spectrum sigma_a = params.FindOneSpectrum("sigma_a", 0.);
00067         Spectrum sigma_s = params.FindOneSpectrum("sigma_s", 0.);
00068         float g = params.FindOneFloat("g", 0.);
00069         Spectrum Le = params.FindOneSpectrum("Le", 0.);
00070         Point p0 = params.FindOnePoint("p0", Point(0,0,0));
00071         Point p1 = params.FindOnePoint("p1", Point(1,1,1));
00072         return new HomogeneousVolume(sigma_a, sigma_s, g, Le, BBox(p0, p1),
00073                 volume2world);
00074 }
